conbody.p: This method identifies the text content differences between two images.

li.p: The AI engine will identify the zones on the images.

conbody.p: In Katalon TestOps, the zones are categorized into 3 types:

ul.li: Identical (green border): shows text-look-like zones identically rendered in both images.
Shifted (blue border): shows text-look-like zones with identical but shifted positions.
Missing/New (pink border): shows text-look-like zones in one image but not in the other.

conbody.p: This method is useful when there is a lot of text content on the pages. It helps users review and prioritize which text changes are critical and need immediate attention.
For step-by-step instructions to use visual testing in Katalon TestOps, see Use TestOps Visual Testing.
